name: Cal's Wake
description:
Cal's Wake is the second game created in my "One Game A Week" challenge. It's a quick platformer about defeating Calcium, an evil skeleton who has been stealing your friends' skins.

CONTROLS [Keyboard/Joypad]:

WASD / LThumbstick: Move

X / X: Swing weapon

C / A: Jump

V / B: Eat bones (for health)

Down + X / Down + X: Throw bone

Let me know on twitter (@skeletonware) if you beat it, and what you liked or didn't like about it!
